name: iDialogue Inc.
description: Developer of an online learning platform intended to connect students with teachers and peers from around the world. The company's platform provides micro-tutoring and tools for self-paced learning combined with on-demand interactive learning activities, such as virtual field trips and workshops with experts, guest speakers and professionals from different areas, enabling students to receive an immersive learning experience.
one_liner: Developer of an online learning platform intended to connect students with teachers and peers from around the world. The company's platform provides micro-tutoring and tools for self-paced learning combined with on-demand interactive learning activities, such as virtual field trips and workshops with experts, guest speakers and professionals from different areas, enabling students to receive an immersive learning experience.
